bioconda.name: bioconductor-generecommender
bioconda.summary: A gene recommender algorithm to identify genes coexpressed with a query set of genes

biotools.summary: This package contains a targeted clustering algorithm for the analysis of microarray data. The algorithm can aid in the discovery of new genes with similar functions to a given list of genes already known to have closely related functions.

bioschemas.name: geneRecommender
bioschemas.summary: This package contains a targeted clustering algorithm for the analysis of microarray data. The algorithm can aid in the discovery of new genes with similar functions to a given list of genes already known to have closely related functions.
